title: Ticket #3851: DMTCP investigation for LIGO
description:
1. How much disk space should we expect a DMTCP checkpoint to use? Does it need extra to do an atomic swap? Does it store all allocated memory, including unused memory?

  2. Reports of DMTCP creating a large number of files. User reported 1M files, but that might be across multiple jobs. Test multi-threaded and/or multi-process beast and see if we're growing at faster than 1 or 2 files per thread/process. (From: "Peter F. Couvares"; Date: "Mon, 12 Aug 2013 20:28:36 +0000"; Subject: "[CondorLIGO] Fwd: [DASWG] Re: condor troubles at CIT")

  3. Reports of DMTCP dumping files in unexpected places: where the executable is. where the DAGMan ran from (that isn't the IWD) (From: "Peter F. Couvares"; Date: "Mon, 12 Aug 2013 20:28:36 +0000"; Subject: "[CondorLIGO] Fwd: [DASWG] Re: condor troubles at CIT")
